scripts.start: npm run env:restart && npm run cc:start -- person
scripts.cc:start: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install person; }; f
scripts.cc:upgrade: f() { npm run cc:package; hurl upgrade person node $1  -P ./chaincode-person; }; f
scripts.cc:start:debug: f() { npm run cc:package; npm run cc:install:debug; }; f
scripts.cc:package: f() { npm run lerna:build; chaincode-manager --update --config ./chaincode.config.json --output ./chaincode-person package; npm run copy:indexes -- person; }; f
scripts.cc:install: f() { hurl install person node -P ./chaincode-person; }; f
scripts.cc:install:debug: f() { hurl install person node -P ./chaincode-person --debug; }; f
